comments.html: Masterpiecie from an ingnorant in economics. Wasted 10min of my life. I suggest read some economic books first.
comments.name: Mike

comments.html:
At that point I would love to see the owner of this blog answering in his (famous) line of questioning:

What is Bitcoin?

What problems is Bitcoin trying to solve?

Does it (technologically) scale the way Bitcoin is trying to solve those problems?
comments.name: Anonymous
